content: A SEX offender who posed as a 12-year-old boy to enrol in schools in Arizona was sentenced to 70 years and six months in jail. The Huffington Post reports 31-year-old Neil Havens Rodreick II pleaded guilty last year to seven criminal charges, including child pornography. By wearing makeup to help him look younger, he convinced teachers, students and administrators at several schools that he was a boy named Casey. Rodreick attended schools in Arizona starting in 2005. Rest here: "http://www.news.com.au/story/0,27574,25308260-2,00.html" "A government big enough to give you everything you want, is strong enough to take everything you have." ~ Gerald Ford
